taskId.description: The ID of the task associated with bulk Sole Proprietor brand and campaign creation.
taskId.title: Taskid

referenceId.description: A user generated unique identifier that keeps track of sole proprietor brand/campaign combinations submitted during bulk creation.
referenceId.title: Referenceid

brand.description: The status of the individual brand submitted via bulk creation.
brand.title: Brand

campaign.description: The status of the individual campaign submitted via bulk creation.
campaign.title: Campaign
